title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Jan
original_name: ひぐらしの哭く頃に 雀
sinopse: This chapter of the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni series, called the "Mahjong" chapter, is related to a "dramatic mahjong" game being released for the PSP in November 2009. This time, Keiichi (a boy who moved to the small village of Hinamizawa), finds himself drawn into a special mahjong course at his school.
